title: so it is strategy to .............
body: log onto a third party app find out who is in a series and make them lose at all costs! use skype or other voip when on opposite teams and assist the enemy team bye giving away positions and ward locations!  to troll other players that are wanting to win trying to win and spam /all SHIVER ME TIMBERS FOR 35MINUTES!  THIS RANK SYSTEM IS A JOKE RIGGED SYSTEM!

replies.body:
Assholes exist, therefore ranked is bad?

Logic/10
